bike.description: S-Works Roubaix FACT 11r carbon, FACT IS construction, 1-1/8" to 1-3/8" head tube, compact race design w/ Zertz inserts, internal cable routing, carbon OSBB

components.description: S-Works FACT carbon full monocoque w/ Zertz inserts
1-1/8" upper and 1-3/8" lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings w/ 20mm carbon cone spacer and 20mm of carbon spacers
Carbon chain stay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
